price: 35. Ee samir siday Rushushii sugnaanta iyo go’aanka adag lahaa u samreen13, hana doondoonin in loo soo dedejiyo  (cadaabkooda). Maalintay arki  waxa loo yaboohay waxay ahaan sida inayan (ku) negaan (adduunka) waxaan ahayn saacad ka mid ah maalin; waa gaarsiin cad ee ma waxaa la rogaa waxaan aheyn dadka caasiyiinta ah.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ كَمَا صَبَرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡعَزۡمِ مِنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ وَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِل لَّهُمۡۚ كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ مَا يُوعَدُونَ لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا سَاعَةٗ مِّن نَّهَارِۭۚ بَلَٰغٞۚ فَهَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
footnotes: 13. Rusushaas go’aanka adag waa Nuux, Ibraahiim,  Muuse,  Ciise,  iyo Muxammad.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir kamā ṣabara ulū al-ʿazmi mina al-rusuli walā tastaʿjil lahum ka-annahum yawma yarawna mā yūʿadūna lam yalbathū illā sāʿatan min nahārin balāghun fahal yuh'laku illā al-qawmu al-fāsiqūna
